FuncDef: The display drop-profile command displays the configuration of a WRED drop profile. If no parameter is specified, brief information about all WRED drop profiles is displayed. The display drop-profile command displays the configuration of a WRED drop profile. If no parameter is specified, brief information about all WRED drop profiles is displayed.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays detailed information about a WRED drop profile with the specified name.
The value must be the name of an existing drop profile on the device.

Displays brief information about all WRED drop profiles.
-

ExtraInfo: You can use the display drop-profile command to view the number of configured drop profiles and all configuration of a specified drop profile.
